20101202073613.000|20101202073615.000|CCO|2006, TWO WEEKS BEFORE SADDAM 
20101202073615.000|20101202073617.000|CCO|HUSSEIN WAS HANGED, WITH 
20101202073617.000|20101202073619.000|CCO|SECTARIAN VIOLENCE RAGING IN THE
20101202073619.000|20101202073621.000|CCO|RUNUP TO THE U.S. TROOP SURGE.
20101202073621.000|20101202073623.500|CCO|ABC NEWS' DAN HARRIS WAS 
20101202073623.500|20101202073626.000|CCO|REPORTING AT A SCHOOL WHEN HIS 
20101202073626.000|20101202073628.500|CCO|LIFE TOOK AN UNEXPECTED TURN.

20101202073631.000|20101202073632.429|CCO|MET DAN.

20101202073633.857|20101202073635.286|CCO|A CHANCE MEETING AT A SCHOOL IN 
20101202073635.286|20101202073636.714|CCO|BAGHDAD IN THE MIDDLE OF A GUN 
20101202073636.714|20101202073638.143|CCO|FIGHT.
20101202073638.143|20101202073639.571|CCO|>> SHOTS.
20101202073639.571|20101202073641.000|CCO|A LOT OF SHOTS.
20101202073641.000|20101202073642.250|CCO|>> Reporter: YOU'RE HOW OLD?
20101202073642.250|20101202073643.500|CCO|>> ME?
20101202073643.500|20101202073644.750|CCO|18.
